name.japanese: パンクハザード・ビスケットルーム

description: A room within Caesar Clown's laboratory on Punk Hazard where the kidnapped children were kept. This is where the children received the NHC10 candy that they became addicted to.

keyEvents.title: Mocha Steals the NHC10 Candy
keyEvents.description: Mocha makes the brave decision to steal all the NHC10 candy from the Biscuits Room and run away with it to prevent the other children from consuming it.
keyEvents.significance: The starting point of the episode's central conflict and Mocha's heroic act.

statusHistory.reason: Room was used by Caesar to keep the children until the end of the Punk Hazard arc

name.japanese: パンクハザード・研究所の廊下

description: The hallways and corridors within Caesar Clown's research laboratory on Punk Hazard. These passages connect various rooms and are where much of the action takes place during the escape from the facility.

keyEvents.title: Chopper, Nami, and Robin Protect the Children
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew members work in the corridors to prevent the addicted children from catching Mocha and taking the deadly candy.
keyEvents.significance: The main setting for the episode's chase sequence and protective efforts.

keyEvents.title: Mocha's Ultimate Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: Cornered in the corridors, Mocha eats all of the NHC10 candy herself to prevent her friends from consuming the deadly drug.
keyEvents.significance: The emotional climax of the episode occurs in these corridors.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Uses Conqueror's Haki
keyEvents.description: Luffy demonstrates his Conqueror's Haki in the corridors to instantly knock out Caesar's subordinates.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's strategic use of Haki in the facility.

keyEvents.title: Zoro and Tashigi Flee the Poison Gas
keyEvents.description: Zoro carries Tashigi through the corridors while running away from Caesar's deadly poison gas.
keyEvents.significance: The corridors are threatened by the spreading poison gas.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory corridors were used throughout the Punk Hazard arc

name.japanese: パンクハザード・ゴミ捨て場

description: A garbage disposal area within the Punk Hazard laboratory where waste is dumped through chutes. Luffy and Momonosuke fell into this area in the previous episode.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Momonosuke Escape
keyEvents.description: Luffy and the unconscious Momonosuke manage to escape from the garbage area where they had fallen.
keyEvents.significance: Reunites Luffy with the main storyline after being separated.

statusHistory.reason: Garbage area was part of the laboratory facility
